definition: variant of 頌詞|颂词[song4 ci2]
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
to resign/to dismiss/to decline/to take leave/ballad (archaic poetic genre)/variant of 詞|词[ci2]

sentences.english: He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the Double Tenth Day.
sentences.chinese: 他爲國慶大典寫了激情澎湃的頌辭。

sentences.english: He wrote an exciting eulogy for the celebrations on the National Day.
sentences.chinese: 他爲國慶大典寫了激情澎湃的頌辭。

sentences.english: No eulogy would do justice to so Great a man.
sentences.chinese: 任何頌辭，俱不能稱此偉人偉大於萬一。
